tool_description: Applies business rules and logic for automatic category assignment and taxonomy maintenance based on configurable rule sets.

product_data_source.description: Reference to product data to apply rules against

rule_execution_order.description: Rule execution strategy: priority_based, sequential, parallel

conflict_resolution.description: How to handle rule conflicts: first_wins, highest_priority, manual_review

dry_run_mode.description: Execute rules without making actual changes

error_messages: Invalid rule format: Rules must follow 'condition:action:priority' format

products_affected.description: Number of products processed by rules

execution_summary.description: Detailed summary of rule execution results
